sentences.en: Beware ramp, eg seen on a road sign.
Could you direct me to the eastbound freeway on ramp, please ?
sentences.cn: 可以告诉我往东走的高速公路入口在哪里 吗 ?

sentences.en: Ely raced his 50 horsepower engine and started to roll down the ramp.
sentences.cn: 伊利起动了他的五十马力引擎,开始从跑道上下滑.

sentences.en: It took five strong men to heave the statue up a ramp and lower it into place.
sentences.cn: 靠了5个强壮的男子才将雕像拉上坡道，再下放到合适的位置。

sentences.en: Lillian was coming down the ramp from the museum.
sentences.cn: 莉莲正从博物馆那边的斜坡上走下来。

sentences.en: Ramps are needed at exits and entrances for wheelchair users.
sentences.cn: 出入口处需有坡道供坐轮椅者使用。

sentences.en: Repeat steps 6 and 7 for the other three ramp colors.
sentences.cn: 其他的三个ramp颜色的选择重复6、7步骤.

sentences.en: She was shepherded by her guards up the rear ramp of the aircraft.
sentences.cn: 她在警卫的护送下上了飞机尾部的舷梯。

sentences.en: So I'll get on that deaf train with a wheelchair ramp.
sentences.cn: 所以我利用了这种方式,就像搭上了通往成功的快速列车.

sentences.en: Some spray would arch over the front ramp.
sentences.cn: 一阵浪花翻过前跳板打进船来.

sentences.en: That driver drove the car up the ramp.
sentences.cn: 那司机将车开上了斜坡.

sentences.en: The approach ramp is a double deck roadway structure.
sentences.cn: 该引桥坡道是双层公路桥.

sentences.en: The Ramp Type indicates the direction of the color gradient.
sentences.cn: Ramp种类表示分层设色的方向.

sentences.en: they ramped up production to meet booming demand.
sentences.cn: 他们扩大生产以满足迅速增长的需求。

sentences.en: This marble ramp weighs one ton.
sentences.cn: 这个大理石台阶重一吨.

sentences.en: Those planes powered down and off the ramp.
sentences.cn: 那几架飞机沿停机坪滑行而出.

sentences.en: We drive up the long ramp and stop in front of the JAL check - in counter.
sentences.cn: 我们把车开上长坡道,在日航办理乘机手续的柜台前停了下来.

words.tran_cn: 暴跳的，暴怒的；粗暴的，狂暴的
猖獗的；蔓延的；狂暴的；奔放的

phrases.tran_cn: 倾斜升温（每单位时间之温度上升）；产能提升；斜升

trans.tran_cn: 土堤斜坡，斜道，敲诈，（装车或上下飞机的）活动梯
trans.tran_en: a slope that has been built to connect two places that are at different levels
